channel.title: News 📰 on Parker Addison
channel.description: Recent content in News 📰 on Parker Addison

item.title: Graduation
item.description: 🎓 Graduated early from UCSD! Huge thanks to the incredible faculty at HDSI for making the beginning of my data science career a magical experience.

item.title: USRA NAMS at NASA Ames
item.description: Began a USRA NAMS project at NASA Ames. I’m researching ideal distributed data storage solutions and benchmarks for efficient ML/data workflows in their NAS division. It’s a small world after all, so we’re actually taking inspiration from the PRP (home to the Nautilus cluster and AR-NOC wouldn’t ya know it 😉)

item.title: Feedback
item.description: The student feedback collected by the data science student reps has seen the light of day! We presented our analysis of the last year of feedback to the data science curriculum meeting.

item.title: HDSI Data Science Capstone
item.description: For our data science capstone we’re building a tool to mitigate bias in network conditions while collecting data. Follow along here

item.title: Arnoc Demo
item.description: We gave our official update report and demo slides for AR-NOC. First time I’ve worked with Unreal Engine!

item.title: AR-NOC
item.description: Began data pipelining work for the AR-NOC team at Nautilus. The NSF wants us to create a no-setup-required virtual environment for VR and AR data visualization.

item.title: Textbook
item.description: Officially started working on the new introductory data science textbook, “Dive into Data Science”
